content: Excellent, Jeff. I do something similar. I put my ideas down on 3 x 5 cards. Then pull one out and write a short chapter. I’m working either on a novella or novel (right now I can’t tell which) and each 500 word exercise is a chapter in the book. I know the themes and the characters so am writing with that in mind. Hopefully, by the time I reach the end of my cards, I’ll be well on my way to completing the work.
